# Graphing Multiple Chart Types in R

```{r, message=FALSE}


### Scatterplot with loess smoother

library(plotly)
mtcars <- mtcars[order(mtcars$disp), ]
p <- plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~disp) %>%
  add_markers(
    y = ~mpg, mode = "markers",
    text = rownames(mtcars), showlegend = FALSE
  )
p %>%
  add_lines(
    y = ~fitted(loess(mpg ~ disp)),
    name = "loess smoother", showlegend = TRUE
  )

### Scatterplot with loess smoother and it's uncertaincy estimates
m <- loess(mpg ~ disp, data = mtcars)
f <- with(predict(m, se = TRUE), data.frame(fit, se.fit, disp=mtcars$disp))

l <- list(
  color = toRGB("gray90", alpha = 0.3),
  fillcolor = toRGB("gray90", alpha = 0.3)
)

p %>%
  add_lines(data = f, y = ~fit, showlegend = FALSE) %>%
  add_lines(
    data = f, y = ~fit + 1.96 * se.fit,
    fill = "tonexty", line = l, showlegend = FALSE
  ) %>%
  add_lines(
    data = f, y = ~fit - 1.96 * se.fit,
    fill = "tonexty", line = l, showlegend = FALSE
  )

```
